name: FSS Switches
description:
NO KEYSTROKE ASSIGNMENT NEEDED
**FULLY Functional** Flight Simulator Switches and Controls
Microsoft Flight Simulator X / Lockheed Prepar3D mode & XPlane mode
!! QUICK and EASY !!

!! Important !!
P3D/FSX Users Must Update FSS Server to v4.0 or higher
Xplane Users: Must Use FSS Server v3.1 (No Further Xplane Development)
Minimum iOS 8 required

*Features*
Staters Switches-- All 4 engines w/ Indicator
Fuel Valve Knobs -- All 4 engines w/ Indicator
Alternator/Generator -- All 4 engines w/ Indicator
APU Starter Switch w/ Indicator
APU Generator Switch w/ Indicator
FULL Auto Pilot Panel w/ N1 Hold & VOR/NAV Hold & Approach Hold w/ Indicator
Pitot Heat Switch w/ Indicator
Engine Anti-Ice -- All 4 engines w/ Indicator
Wing DeIce Switch w/ Indicator
Prop Heat Switch w/ Indicator
PushBack Activation -- Straight, Tail Left, Tail Right w/ Indicator
Parking Brake Lever w/ Indicator
VIEW Change 3D, 2D, Locked Spot & Panel 1 hide/show
Altimeter Set (STD or Actual) set Altimeter to actual at any time
Landing Gear Lever w/ Indicators (Down, Transition & Up)
Take Off Go Around Power Button w/ Indicator
Speed Brake Arm Button w/ Indicator
Auto Brake Switch
Lights (Nav,Strobe, Beacon, Taxi, Landing, Instrument, Logo, Wing, Rec) w/ Indicator
Battery Master Switch w/ Indicator
Avionics Master Switch w/ Indicator

PREPAR3D v4 users:
"MUST" have Pete Dawson's FSUIPC5 with or without WIDEFS7 installed on PC (registered FSUIPC is preferred but unregistered"FREE" functions also).
Available at:
http://www.schiratti.com/dowson.html

FSX / PREPAR3D v2 & v3 users:
"MUST" have Pete Dawson's FSUIPC4 with or without WIDEFS7 installed in FSX (registered FSUIPC is preferred but unregistered"FREE" functions also).
Available at:
http://www.schiratti.com/dowson.html

XPlane users:
"MUST" have XPUIPC or WPWideClient installed.
Available at
http://www.tosi-online.de/XPUIPC/XPUIPC.html

User "MUST" also download and Install (a very LIGHT weight server) FSS Server ver 2.0 or Higher from www.flightsimsystemsllc.com
README is include in the download. **SIMPLE** 1-5 minutes NO Key Assignment install and you are ready.

The PC's IP Address will be displayed in FSS Server window(enter That IP Address in the FSS App and tap Connect)

"FULLY COMPATIBLE with SkeeterBilt FlyPod"
Many Thanks to all that contributed to XPUIPC
Many Thanks to Pete Dawson, Istavan Varadi, and all that contributed to FSUIPC
